channel.title: EdgePKersX - First ReleaseProject - Quick Prayers, Autocasting, HC W spec + MORE
channel.description:
[center]EDIT : working on EdgePKersX V2, gonna make multi cannon,fix some bugs, make summoning 100% or close to it, add specs for more summonings like steel titan, etc.
Source download:
Alright well ive had this server for a while (atleast the source) (tbh i switch clients every couple weeks xD) and i really havent done anything with it like putting it online or releasing, so just decided to release it >.>
The source is hybrid pvp v3 which is why i suggest you just take some features and put it on a stable source, but ive never had any memleak probs or anything but just to be safe
The client is insidiax so i give 99% credits to insidiaX for the client(which is why i havent deleted the names or anything from client) and 1% creds to me for adding some things to it
Some of the features are listed in a txt file that comes with the source along with some notes
for people who cba trying to find features ive added: NOTE: THIS IS DSPK SO YOU MIGHT WANT TO JUST TAKE SOME FEATURES AND PUT IT ON A STABLE SOURCE but tbh ive never had a memleak problem or anything of that nature, but just better to be safe
- ring of kinship - id 15707 - quick prayers fully working server sided and working like 80% client sided, just need to fix checks when clicked and 2 augury pray orbs arent supposed to be there cause i dont have those prays - right clicking autocast (autocasting without a staff) - changed home to the dwarf place cause for some reason i lagged at edge with this client - added korasi anims/gfx, and server sided spec hit withs mage (cba doing multi hit) - added like 50 tuts/snippets, including sailing, achievement system, clue scrolls, gnome gliders, POS, etc. - made 2 holliday quests, a christmas one and a hween one - fixed some things with summoning, also made some specs for like 3-4 fams - some custom interfaces - hand cannon special - got rid of some unneeded folders - idk why but combat is kind of better than what i started out with even thou i barely touched cb class - all emotes work with correct anims and no weapon when doing anim - mage actually hits according to your lvl now - all curses and prayers work (excluding summoning with other headprayers) - was working on all lunar spells, but got bored and stopped after i finished heal other and energy transfer xD - combat icons, critical hits, fading, etc, full credits to InsidiaX for client - new friends tab - source comes with a server manager (located in /Data/ folder), you can look for any items on the server, check ranks, and theres an eco trimmer - working deflects on players and npcs and working berserker effect ( like i said all curses work) - bosses hit through prayer, but not as often/hard - basic combat bugs fixed, pray being drained when no one used ss or smite, double range hit, etc - drops are loaded through config class - all stackables and notes - thanks k4rn4ge :DD - made logs for pms, trade, suggestions, reports - added a snippet for only 2 starters per ip - added summon special amount - average engine load / player = .17%
[IMG]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/559/pic1oh.png[/img] [IMG]http://img822.imageshack.us/img822/5257/pic2gv.png[/img] [IMG]http://img24.imageshack.us/img24/2294/pic3cu.png[/img] [IMG]http://img51.imageshack.us/img51/4355/pic4ylw.png[/img] [IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7052/pic6gg.png[/img] [IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/2483/pic10.png[/img] [IMG]http://img716.imageshack.us/img716/5674/pic8f.png[/img] [IMG]http://img143.imageshack.us/img143/6662/pic12.png[/img] [IMG]http://img153.imageshack.us/img153/4784/pic13i.png[/img] [IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/3241/pic14d.png[/img] [IMG]http://img263.imageshack.us/img263/3020/frostdragons.png[/img] [IMG]http://img825.imageshack.us/img825/4726/customdungeoneeringboss.png[/img] [IMG]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/2816/deflects.png[/img] [/center]

item.title: EdgePKersX - First ReleaseProject - Quick Prayers, Autocasting, HC W spec + MORE
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Hot_Potato:

Thanks for re-releasing InsidiaX.

If you ever used the actual source from R-S, you would know it’s far better than Insidiax.
It’s a Hybrid PvP V3 source and InsidiaX client, since he decided he would never use it, he never edited the client.

Read full topic

item.title: EdgePKersX - First ReleaseProject - Quick Prayers, Autocasting, HC W spec + MORE
item.dc:creator: @relexlawlz relexlawlz
item.description:
@relexlawlz wrote:

for people who cba trying to find features ive added:
NOTE: THIS IS DSPK SO YOU MIGHT WANT TO JUST TAKE SOME FEATURES AND PUT IT ON A STABLE SOURCE
but tbh ive never had a memleak problem or anything of that nature, but just better to be safe

  • ring of kinship - id 15707
  • quick prayers fully working server sided and working like 80% client sided, just need to fix
    checks when clicked and 2 augury pray orbs arent supposed to be there cause i dont have those prays
  • right clicking autocast (autocasting without a staff)
  • changed home to the dwarf place cause for some reason i lagged at edge with this client
  • added korasi anims/gfx, and server sided spec hit withs mage (cba doing multi hit)
  • added like 50 tuts/snippets, including sailing, achievement system, clue scrolls, gnome gliders, POS, etc.
  • made 2 holliday quests, a christmas one and a hween one
  • fixed some things with summoning, also made some specs for like 3-4 fams
  • some custom interfaces
  • hand cannon special
  • got rid of some unneeded folders
  • idk why but combat is kind of better than what i started out with even thou i barely touched cb class
  • all emotes work with correct anims and no weapon when doing anim
  • mage actually hits according to your lvl now
  • all curses and prayers work (excluding summoning with other headprayers)
  • was working on all lunar spells, but got bored and stopped after i finished heal other and energy transfer xD
  • combat icons, critical hits, fading, etc, full credits to InsidiaX for client
  • new friends tab
  • source comes with a server manager (located in /Data/ folder), you can look for any items on the server,
    check ranks, and theres an eco trimmer
  • working deflects on players and npcs and working berserker effect ( like i said all curses work)
  • bosses hit through prayer, but not as often/hard
  • basic combat bugs fixed, pray being drained when no one used ss or smite, double range hit, etc
  • drops are loaded through config class
  • all stackables and notes - thanks k4rn4ge :DD
  • made logs for pms, trade, suggestions, reports
  • added a snippet for only 2 starters per ip
  • added summon special amount
  • average engine load / player = .17%

Read full topic
item.source: EdgePKersX - First ReleaseProject - Quick Prayers, Autocasting, HC W spec + MORE

[center]EDIT : working on EdgePKersX V2, gonna make multi cannon,fix some bugs, make summoning 100% or close to it, add specs for more summonings like steel titan, etc.

Source download:

Alright well ive had this server for a while (atleast the source) (tbh i switch clients every couple weeks xD) and i really havent done anything with it like putting it online or releasing, so just decided to release it >.>

The source is hybrid pvp v3 which is why i suggest you just take some features and put it on a stable source, but ive never had any memleak probs or anything but just to be safe

The client is insidiax so i give 99% credits to insidiaX for the client(which is why i havent deleted the names or anything from client) and 1% creds to me for adding some things to it

but tbh ive never had a memleak problem or anything of that nature, but just better to be safe

  • ring of kinship - id 15707
  • quick prayers fully working server sided and working like 80% client sided, just need to fix
    checks when clicked and 2 augury pray orbs arent supposed to be there cause i dont have those prays
  • right clicking autocast (autocasting without a staff)
  • changed home to the dwarf place cause for some reason i lagged at edge with this client
  • added korasi anims/gfx, and server sided spec hit withs mage (cba doing multi hit)
  • added like 50 tuts/snippets, including sailing, achievement system, clue scrolls, gnome gliders, POS, etc.
  • made 2 holliday quests, a christmas one and a hween one
  • fixed some things with summoning, also made some specs for like 3-4 fams
  • some custom interfaces
  • hand cannon special
  • got rid of some unneeded folders
  • idk why but combat is kind of better than what i started out with even thou i barely touched cb class
  • all emotes work with correct anims and no weapon when doing anim
  • mage actually hits according to your lvl now
  • all curses and prayers work (excluding summoning with other headprayers)
  • was working on all lunar spells, but got bored and stopped after i finished heal other and energy transfer xD
  • combat icons, critical hits, fading, etc, full credits to InsidiaX for client
  • new friends tab
  • source comes with a server manager (located in /Data/ folder), you can look for any items on the server,
    check ranks, and theres an eco trimmer
  • working deflects on players and npcs and working berserker effect ( like i said all curses work)
  • bosses hit through prayer, but not as often/hard
  • basic combat bugs fixed, pray being drained when no one used ss or smite, double range hit, etc
  • drops are loaded through config class
  • all stackables and notes - thanks k4rn4ge :DD
  • made logs for pms, trade, suggestions, reports
  • added a snippet for only 2 starters per ip
  • added summon special amount
  • average engine load / player = .17%














[/center]
